sqlMap.insert: insert into dev_form( ID, menu_id, FORM_NAME, ENTITY_ID, INIT_TYPE, is_relation, parent_code, STATUS, CREATED, CREATE_TIME, UPDATED, UPDATE_TIME) values( #id#, #menuId#, #formName#, #entityId#, #initType#, #isRelation#, #parentCode#, #status#, #created#, #createTime#, #updated#, #updateTime#)
sqlMap.delete: update dev_form set status='0' where id=#id#
sqlMap.select: select id, menu_id as menuId, form_name as formName, entity_id as entityId, init_type as initType, is_relation as isRelation, parent_code as parentCode, status, created, create_time as createTime, updated, update_time as updateTime from dev_form where id=#id#
sqlMap.update:
update dev_form
id=#id# menu_id=#menuId#
form_name=#formName#
entity_id=#entityId#
init_type=#initType#
status=#status#
created=#created#
create_time=#createTime#
updated=#updated#
update_time=#updateTime#
is_relation=#isRelation#
parent_code=#parentCode#
where id=#id#
sqlMap.select: select id, menu_id as menuId, form_name as formName, entity_id as entityId, init_type as initType, is_relation as isRelation, parent_code as parentCode, status, created, create_time as createTime, updated, update_time as updateTime from dev_form where status='1'

select id, menu_id as menuId, form_name as formName, entity_id as entityId, init_type as initType, is_relation as isRelation, parent_code as parentCode, status, created, create_time as createTime, updated, update_time as updateTime from dev_form where status='1'
select count(*) from dev_entity e, dev_form f where f.status='1' and f.entity_id = e.id

select f.id as id, f.menu_id as menuId, f.form_name as formName, f.entity_id as entityId, e.entity_code as entityCode, f.init_type as initType, f.status as status, f.created as created, f.create_time as createTime, f.updated as updated, f.update_time as updateTime, f.is_relation as isRelation, f.parent_code as parentCode from dev_entity e, dev_form f where f.status = '1' and f.entity_id = e.id
e.entity_code like concat('%',#entityCode#,'%')
sqlMap.update: update dev_form set menu_id='' where menu_id = #menuId#
